content:
```python
class Foo:
    def __init__(self, s: set = set()):
        self.s = s


if __name__ == "__main__":
    f1 = Foo()
    f2 = Foo()
    f1.s.add(1)
    f1.s.add(2)
    f1.s.add(3)
    print(f2.s)

```

class Foo:
    def __init__(self, s: set = set()):
        self.s = s


if __name__ == "__main__":
    f1 = Foo()
    f2 = Foo()
    f1.s.add(1)
    f1.s.add(2)
    f1.s.add(3)
    print(f2.s)
